data.title: Medical pay: reaping your just rewards?
data.text:
TY - JOUR

T1 - Medical pay: reaping your just rewards?

AU - Exworthy, Mark

AU - Hyde, Paula

AU - McDonald-Kuhne, Pamela

PY - 2013/7/23

Y1 - 2013/7/23

N2 - Bonus payments in the NHS are nothing new, having been in place since the very start. But are performance related pay schemes such as clinical excellence awards a price worth paying?

AB - Bonus payments in the NHS are nothing new, having been in place since the very start. But are performance related pay schemes such as clinical excellence awards a price worth paying?
